data.name: CreateCashReceiptDetailStatHistory
CreateCashReceiptStatusHistory
ReadCashReceipt
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CASH_RECEIPT_ID from CKT_CASH_RECEIPT where CASH_RECEIPT_ID = @cashReceiptId

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetail
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CRD_ID, COLLAMT_APPL_IND from CKT_CR_DETAIL where (@crtIdentifier = CRT_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstIdentifier = CST_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvIdentifier = CRV_IDENTIFIER) and (CRD_ID = @crdId)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailStatHistoryCashReceiptDetailStatus
data.value: select top(1) CRD_IDENTIFIER, CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CDS_IDENTIFIER, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, REASON_CODE_ID, CREATED_BY, DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_CRDTL_STATHIST where (@crdIdentifier = CRD_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvIdentifier = CRV_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstIdentifier = CST_IDENTIFIER) and (@crtIdentifier = CRT_IDENTIFIER) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailStatus
data.value: select top(1) CRDETAIL_STAT_ID, CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_CR_DETAIL_STAT where (CRDETAIL_STAT_ID = @crdetailStatId) and (EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE > @effectiveDate)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptStatus
data.value: select top(1) CR_STATUS_ID from CKT_CR_STATUS where CR_STATUS_ID = @crStatusId

data.name: ReadCashReceiptStatusHistoryCashReceiptStatus
data.value: select top(1) CRT_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRV_IDENTIFIER, CRS_IDENTIFIER, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, CREATED_BY, DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_CR_STATUS_HIST where (@crtIdentifier = CRT_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstIdentifier = CST_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvIdentifier = CRV_IDENTIFIER) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate)

data.name: UpdateCashReceiptDetailStatHistory
data.value: update CKT_CRDTL_STATHIST set DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate where (CRD_IDENTIFIER = @crdIdentifier) and (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier) and (CDS_IDENTIFIER = @cdsIdentifier) and (CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp)
